attributes.action: This country calls on Theresa May to resign.
attributes.additional_details: The Prime Minister is trying to use the two year Article 50 deadline to blackmail the people of this Country. She is acting in an entirely inappropriate way. The voice of the people, their elected representatives, have rejected the deal twice. She refuses to change approach. Accordingly, she should resign as she is now opposing the will of the people as voiced by their elected representatives.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has overseen two of the largest defeats in Parliamentary history. She has attacked MPs for doing their job. She continues to force a deal upon the people that Parliament has rejected twice. Any right thinking Prime Minister would resign in the circumstances.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that call for someone to lose their job, including government Ministers.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
